IBA_J.ConvertListFiles.MPA3

Class MPA3

  • java.lang.Object
    • IBA_J.ConvertListFiles.MPA3.MPA3

  • public final class MPA3
extends java.lang.Object
    MPA contains a list of ADCs

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MPA3()
      Default constructor.
      MPA3(int adc)
      Constructor for any number of ADCs in an MPA3

    • Method Summary

      Adds the events of the specified ADCs at the ADC corresponding to the specified position
      ADC getADC(int adc)
      Gets an ADC in MPA3
      void initialize()
      Creates a list of 16 ADCs (AIFIRA default channels) in MPA

      Creates a list of ADCs in MPA

      Processes the sum of 2 ADCs and adds it at the end of the MPA list

    • Constructor Detail

      • MPA3

        public MPA3()
        Default constructor. MPA3 is a list of ADCs (default is 16 ADCs)
        See Also:
        initialize

      • MPA3

        public MPA3(int adc)
        Constructor for any number of ADCs in an MPA3
        Parameters:
        adc - Number of ADCs in an MPA3

    • Method Detail

      • getADC

        public ADC getADC(int adc)
        Gets an ADC in MPA3
        Parameters:
        adc - Index of ADC in list
        Returns:
        the ADC corresponding to the index

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Creates a list of 16 ADCs (AIFIRA default channels) in MPA

      • initialize

        public void initialize(int nADC)
        Creates a list of ADCs in MPA
        Parameters:
        nADC - Number of ADC in the list

      • sumADC

        public int sumADC(int adc1,
                  int adc2)
        Processes the sum of 2 ADCs and adds it at the end of the MPA list
        Parameters:
        adc1 - index of 1st ADC
        adc2 - index of 2nd ADC
        Returns:
        The number of ADCs in the MPA after adding the new summed ADCs

      • addToSum

        public void addToSum(int adc1,
                     int position)
        Adds the events of the specified ADCs at the ADC corresponding to the specified position
        Parameters:
        adc1 - ADC to be added
        position - index of the ADC which will contains the sum of the events

      • sumADC

        public void sumADC(int adc1,
                   int adc2,
                   int position)
        Processes the sum of 2 ADC and adds it to the specified position in mpa list
        Parameters:
        adc1 - Index of the first adc to be summed
        adc2 - Index of the second adc to be summed
        position - Index in the mpa list of recorded adc
